College Cohort Program (CCP) | New Student Center | New York University                                                Navigation       College of Arts and Science                 About Arts and Science | Departments and Programs | The Faculty                       Home > College Cohort Program (CCP)         College Cohort Program (CCP)     The College Cohort Program (CCP) is a school specific program that provides all CAS first-year students the opportunity to build a small community within CAS that is diverse in intellectual range, serves as a crucible for debate and scholarship, and fosters a welcoming and supportive home. Each cohort will focus on three key principles: C ollege Life, A cademic Inquiry, and S ervice . Click here to learn more!                  Home     College Cohort Program (CCP)              Freshman Year              Sophomore Year              Junior Year              Senior Year              Transfer & Transition Students         Events       Student Leadership       Resources       Contact Us                          Stay Connected           Facebook       Twitter       Vimeo       Instagram             Contact Us
